    All Classes and Interfaces

    Class
    Description
    AlreadyApprovedException
    Represents an exception that is thrown when someone tries to registers but the account exists and approved
    Application
    Represents a student's application for a specific internship opportunity.
    ApplicationService
    Service class for managing internship applications Handles application submissions, reviews, acceptances, and withdrawals
    ApplicationStatus
    Application status for tracking
    AsciiTableFormatter
    class helps to format data into table form.
    AsciiTableFormatter.Row
     
    AttributeGetter
    The AttributeGetter class provides helper methods to prompt and receive user inputs while doing basic validation
    AuthenticationException
    An abstract exception that is the base class for all exceptions related to authentication.
    AuthenticationService
    Service class for authentication Handles changing password and validating login
    CareerStaff
    Represents a career staff extends the User class
    ChangePage
    The ChangePage class is responsible for changing the console output screen to a new blank screen.
    ChangePasswordUI
    This class is UI for change of user's password.
    CompanyRep
    Represents a company representative Extends the User class to inherit basic user attributes
    CsvLoader
    CSVLoader read CSV to create relevant objects which are added to repository
    Displayable
    The Displayable interface provides a structure for objects to be formatted into table for displaying
    DisplayableViewer
    Utility class for rendering objects that implement the Displayable interface and print.
    Exit
    UI class to display exit page and end terminal terminal is stopped and system is killed
    FilterCriteria
    Represents a set of filtering criteria to filer internship opportunities Stores internship status, major, internship level, closing date and company name can construct FilterCriteria with attributes as null first
    FilterUI
    The FilterUI class manage the user interface for applying and modifying filter criteria for internship opportunities such as internship status, preferred major, internship level, and closing date.
    FindDataDirectory
    find the data dir in user machine
    GraphicLogo
     
    IApplicationRepo
    contain methods related to application for repository to implement
    IInternshipRepo
    contain methods related to internship for repository to implement
    InputHelper
    A utility class to help with common console input operations
    InternBuilder
    Builder class for creating an instance of InternshipOpportunity.
    InternshipLevel
    Represents the level of an internship.
    InternshipOpportunity
    Each rep contains internshipOpportunity and this class help create the object Contains the relevant beaviours such as adding application to pending list or moving it to approved
    InternshipService
    Service class for managing internship Handles internship creation, deletion, edit and changes
    InternshipVetRequest
    Represents a request for vetting an internship.
    InternStatus
    internship status
    IRepository
    contain methods related to users for repository to implement
    IRequestRepo
    contain methods related to request for repository to implement
    IUser
     
    LoginPageUI
    contain UI for login and registration
    Main
    Main class to start the system
    MaxExceedException
    Represents an exception that is thrown when there been a exceed in limit like number of application or internship.
    ObjectAlreadyExistsException
    Represents an exception that is thrown when trying to create object that already exists in the system, used to esnure no repeated request created
    ObjectNotFoundException
    Represents an exception that is thrown when a requested object is not found.
    PageBackException
    Represents an exception that is thrown to simulate toggling to the previous page.
    PasswordHasher
    Helps to hash password and verify them using the SHA3-256 algorithm
    PasswordIncorrectException
    Represents an exception that is thrown when the provided password is not valid.
    RegistrationRequest
    Represents a registration request allows the processing of registration requests, including approval or rejection,
    RepController
    Controller for company representatives.
    RepMenuUI
    Console menu for company representatives to create and manage internship opportunities.
    RepNotApprovedException
    Represents an exception that is thrown when a company representative account is rejected and they try to login The exception provides a message detailing the specific representative's ID.
    RepPendingApprovalException
    Represents an exception that is thrown when a company representative's account is pending for approval but they try to login in
    RepStatus
    account state of company representative
    Request
    Represents an abstract request that contains details about a request and provide method approve and reject to be implemented
    RequestService
    Service class for managing request Handles request creation, deletion, approval and rejection
    StaffController
    controller class for Career staff act as layer between user and services allow staff to view internship,process request and generate report
    StaffUI
    The StaffUI class for staff UI It interacts with staff to manage internships and process request
    Student
    Represents a student user
    StudentController
    controller class for student act as layer between user and services allow student to view internship, apply and withdraw from internship
    StudentUI
    UI for student
    SystemController
    Serve as pseudo singleton coordinate the whole system and intialise all the required service and repository
    SystemDataManager
    SystemDataManger create system repository and load data into repository save the repository data as .dat file for future runs
    SystemRepository
    Class serve as Data base and contains all the system's data serve as single source of truth
    User
    Abstract class for user serving as the base class for different types of users and provides common attributes - name, ID, hashed password, and role
    UserController
    Base abstract class for user controls implements method for change of password
    UserFactory
    The UserFactory class provides a static factory method to create different types of users based on role.
    UserNotFoundException
    Represents an exception that is thrown when a specific user cannot be found.
    UserRole
    Enum of user role
    Welcome
    UI class to show welcome page of system Displaying menu to login, register or exit the system User is promopted for input and its validated before calling relevant methods
    WithdrawalRequest
    Represents a withdrawal request made for a specific application.
